RecyclingTypes.Name: Batteries
RecyclingTypes.HowToDispose: Batteries can be given to local recycling centers and drop-off locations such as Best Buy, Home Depot, Staples and Lowes.

RecyclingTypes.Name: Beverage Containers
RecyclingTypes.HowToDispose: These can be redeemed at a local recycling center or picked up by the regular public waste management system.

RecyclingTypes.Name: Carpet
RecyclingTypes.HowToDispose: Should be given to a carpet collection facility for recycling.

RecyclingTypes.Name: E-Waste
RecyclingTypes.HowToDispose: Do not throw these in the trash. They can be brought to an e-waste recycler such as Best Buy or Staples.

RecyclingTypes.Name: Mattresses
RecyclingTypes.HowToDispose: Can be donated or dropped of at a designated collection center.

RecyclingTypes.Name: Organic Waste
RecyclingTypes.HowToDispose: This waste can be composted at home or by the city or private company.

RecyclingTypes.Name: Used Motor Oil
RecyclingTypes.HowToDispose: Can be given to a certified collection center for recycling.
